Begin Row: k1, k1 wrapping yarn twice around needle*
Repeat: k3, k3 wrapping yarn twice for each st, k3, k1 wrapping yarn twice
k3, sl 3 wyib dw, k3, sl 1 wyib dw
p3, sl 3 wyif, p3, sl 1 wyif
k3, sl 3 wyib dw, k3, sl 1 wyib dw
p3, sl 3 wyif, p3, sl 1 wyif

k1, sl 2 wyib; drop 1st st of group of 3 sl-sts off needle to front, sl same 2 sts back to left-hand needle, pick up dropped st and knit it; k2; sl 1 wyib (2nd st of the group), dr 3rd sl-st off needle to front; k2; pick up dropped st and knit it; k1, sl 1 wyib

Begin Row: k1, k2 wrapping yarn twice for each st*
Repeat: k3, k1 wrapping yarn twice, k3, k3 wrapping yarn twice for each st
End Row: k3, k1 wrapping yarn twice, k3, k2 wrapping yarn twice for each st, k1

Repeat: k3, sl 1 wyib dw, k3, sl 3 wyib dw
End Row: k3, sl 1 wyib dw, k3, sl 2 wyib dw, k1

Repeat: p3, sl 1 wyif, p3, sl 3 wyif
End Row: p3, sl 1 wyif, p3, sl 2 wyif, p1

Repeat: k3, sl 1 wyib dw, k3, sl 3 wyib dw
End Row: k3, sl 1 wyib dw, k3, sl 2 wyib dw, k1

Repeat: p3, sl 1 wyif, p3, sl 3 wyif
End Row: p3, sl 1 wyif, p3, sl 2 wyif, p1

Repeat: sl 1 wyib; drop next sl-st off needle to front of work; k2; pick up dropped st and knit it; k1, sl 1 wyib, k1, sl 2 wyib, drop next sl-st off needle to front of work, sl the same 2 sts back to left-hand needle, pick up dropped st and knit it; k2
